title: Bouncing Ball
description: This project demonstrates basic physics and allows the user to continuously place balls that bounce around the box.

title: Personal Gretting Form
description: This project demonstrates use of a url passing information from one page to the next.

title: Fahrenheit to Celsius Converter
description: This project allows the user to convert tempreture measured in Fahrenheit to Celsius.

title: Moving Estimate
description: This project demonstrates an example of a moving cost form.

title: Algebra I Practice Quiz
description: This project demonstrates an example of an Algebra 1 quiz.

title: Create Account Form
description: This project demonstrates a basic example of a sign-up form where the user creates a username and password. The form validates the information and displays it on another page.

title: Tangrams
description: This project demonstrates a simple game of tangrams where the user attemps to match the given shapes to the provided outlines.

title: Book Review Comment
description: This project demonstrates a basic example of a review form that has a character count.

title: Checkout Form
description: This project demonstrates a basic example of a checkout form.

title: Lunch Selections Form
description: This project demonstrates a basic example of a lunch selection form.

title: Customer Reviews
description: This project demonstrates a basic example of a customer review list.

title: Change Calculator
description: This project demonstrates an example of breaking down dollar amounts into change.

title: Footnotes
description: This project demonstrates an example of using the new window function to create footnotes.

title: Calculator
description: This project demonstrates an example of a basic calculator.

title: Angular Degrees to Circular Radians Converter
description: This project demonstrates an example of a angular degrees to circular radians converter.

title: Matching Game
description: This project demonstrates an example of a simple matching card game.
